sentences.en: A four - lane expressway runs straight to the capital.
sentences.cn: 一条四车道的高速公路直通首都.

sentences.en: A new expressway is being paved from Shenyang to Dalian.
sentences.cn: 从沈阳到大连的一条新的高速公路正在修建.

sentences.en: At the end of the bridge the expressway split into two roads.
sentences.cn: 这条高速公路在桥的尽头分成两条路.
他沿高速公路高速行驶。

sentences.en: Its curved shape responds gracefully to the curved expressway entrance ramp.
sentences.cn: 它具有弧度的外形也与机场高速路入口弯道很雅致地相互呼应.

sentences.en: Motor vehicles shall be parked at the prescribed places on the expressway.
sentences.cn: 机动车只能在高速公路的规定地点停靠.

sentences.en: Note: a Data in this table exclude traffic accidents on expressway.
sentences.cn: 注: 1本表数据不含高速公路交通事故.

sentences.en: Our car was driving at a breathtaking speed down the expressway.
sentences.cn: 我们的车子沿着高速公路以惊人的速度行驶.

sentences.en: Our company near Beijing - Shanghai Railway, ancient Beijing - Hangzhou River , national way, Shanghai - Nanjing Expressway.
sentences.cn: 紧靠京沪铁路 、 行古运河 、 12国道、宁高速公路.

sentences.en: The automobile spun over the smooth expressway.
sentences.cn: 汽车在平坦的高速公路上飞驰.

sentences.en: The car collision succeeded on the expressway due to a dense fog.
sentences.cn: 因为浓雾,在高速公路上发生了连续撞车事件.

sentences.en: The data of Sichuan include the data of Traffic Accidents on Expressway.
sentences.cn: 合计中含高速公路交通事故的数据.

sentences.en: The expressway goes [ leads ] straight to Shenyang.
sentences.cn: 这条高速公路 直通 沈阳.

sentences.en: The mucociliary stream is like an expressway.
sentences.cn: 粘纤毛涤就象一条高速公路一样.

sentences.en: Then he swung the car onto the expressway.
sentences.cn: 然后他便转弯把车驶入了高速公路。

sentences.en: There is an expressway between the two adjacent cities.
sentences.cn: 这两个相邻城市间有高速公路.

sentences.en: We enjoyed driving along the new expressway.
sentences.cn: 我们喜欢沿着新建的高速公路开车.

trans.tran_en: a wide road in a city on which cars can travel very quickly without stopping
